TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataPointFilter

summary.span: 公開 方法，此方法允許自訂篩選 資料。

span.span: Exposes the method, which allows data to be custom filtered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面會公開方法，這個方法會採用一系列的特定資料點，並傳回`Boolean`值，決定是否將會篩選該資料點。The interface exposes the method, which takes a specific data point within a series and returns a `Boolean` value that determines whether that data point will be filtered. 若要執行自訂的篩選：To perform custom filtering: - 衍生自此介面新的或現有的類別。Derive a new or existing class from this interface. - 覆寫方法以提供自訂的篩選邏輯。Override the method to provide the custom filtering logic. - 若要起始篩選作業，請呼叫其中一種`Filter`方法類別接受做為其第一個參數的物件。To initiate the filtering operation, call one of the `Filter` methods in the class that takes an object as its first parameter. 如範例的原始程式碼，請參閱方法。For sample source code, see the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool FilterDataPoint (System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint point, System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series series, int pointIndex);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool FilterDataPoint(class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint point, class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series series, int32 pointIndex) cil managed
public: bool FilterDataPoint(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DataPoint ^ point, System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::Series ^ series, int pointIndex);

param.name: series
param.span: 資料點所屬的 物件。

span.span: The object that the data point belongs to.

param.name: pointIndex
param.span: 資料點的索引，其可決定資料點在數列中的位置。

span.span: The index of the data point, which determines its position in the series.

summary.span: 決定是否會篩選數列中的特定資料點。

span.span: Determines whether a particular data point in the series will be filtered.

returns.span: 如果已經移除資料點，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the data point is removed, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法應該呼叫每個資料點在一系列，並傳回`Boolean`值，指出是否應該篩選資料點。This method should be called for each data point in a series, and returns a `Boolean` value indicating whether a data point should be filtered. 若要提供自訂的篩選，衍生新的或現有的類別，從介面，並接著實作這個方法。To provide custom filtering, derive a new or existing class from the interface and then implement this method. 提供自訂邏輯，比對的準則，然後傳回`true`或`false`來標示資料點，以進行篩選。Provide custom criteria matching logic, then return `true` or `false` to mark the data points to be filtered. 實作這個方法之後，使用其中一種`Filter`方法定義中的類別接受物件做為參數進行篩選。After this method has been implemented, use one of the `Filter` method definitions in the class that takes an object as a parameter to perform the filtering. 已篩選的點，根據預設，會移除從一系列。Filtered points, by default, are removed from a series. 它們也可以顯示為空點的值設定屬性`true`。They can also be displayed as empty points by setting the value of the property to `true`. 篩選過的點也標示，如果不符合篩選準則，由篩選為值。Filtered points can also be marked as filtered if they do not match filtering criteria, as determined by the value.
